get.description:
OpenApi3 schema for this API. Format can be selected via content negotiation.

- YAML: application/vnd.oai.openapi
- JSON: application/vnd.oai.openapi+json
Simple endpoint to set the CSRF cookie for the frontend.

post.description:
Takes a set of user credentials and returns an access and refresh JSON web
token pair to prove the authentication of those credentials.

Takes a refresh type JSON web token and returns an access type JSON web
token if the refresh token is valid.

Check the credentials and return the REST Token
if the credentials are valid and authenticated.
Calls Django Auth login method to register User ID
in Django session framework

Accept the following POST parameters: username, password
Return the REST Framework Token Object's key.

Calls Django logout method and delete the Token object
assigned to the current User object.

Accepts/Returns nothing.

post.description:
Calls Django Auth SetPasswordForm save method.

Accepts the following POST parameters: new_password1, new_password2
Returns the success/fail message.

Calls Django Auth PasswordResetForm save method.

Accepts the following POST parameters: email
Returns the success/fail message.

Password reset e-mail link is confirmed, therefore
this resets the user's password.

Accepts the following POST parameters: token, uid,
    new_password1, new_password2
Returns the success/fail message.

Registers a new user.

Accepts the following POST parameters: username, email, password1, password2.

Resends another email to an unverified email.

Accepts the following POST parameter: email.

Verifies the email associated with the provided key.

Accepts the following POST parameter: key.

get.description:
Reads and updates UserModel fields
Accepts GET, PUT, PATCH methods.

Default accepted fields: username, first_name, last_name
Default display fields: pk, username, email, first_name, last_name
Read-only fields: pk, email

Returns UserModel fields.

put.description:
Reads and updates UserModel fields
Accepts GET, PUT, PATCH methods.

Default accepted fields: username, first_name, last_name
Default display fields: pk, username, email, first_name, last_name
Read-only fields: pk, email

Returns UserModel fields.

patch.description:
Reads and updates UserModel fields
Accepts GET, PUT, PATCH methods.

Default accepted fields: username, first_name, last_name
Default display fields: pk, username, email, first_name, last_name
Read-only fields: pk, email

Returns UserModel fields.

Serializer f√ºr Leaderboard-Eintr√§ge:
Gibt user (StringRelatedField), xp, real_layer und cyber_layer aus.

real_layer.description:
Snapshot Realit√§ts-Layer am Season-Ende

* `BaseLayer` - BaseLayer
* `EmotionLayer` - EmotionLayer
* `FlowLayer` - FlowLayer
* `CoreLayer` - CoreLayer
* `UltraLayer` - UltraLayer

cyber_layer.description:
Snapshot Cyber-Layer am Season-Ende

* `SurfaceWebLayer` - SurfaceWebLayer
* `DeepNetLayer` - DeepNetLayer
* `DarkCodeLayer` - DarkCodeLayer
* `SyntheticLayer` - SyntheticLayer
* `VOIDLayer` - VOIDLayer

PasswordReset.description: Serializer for requesting a password reset e-mail.

PasswordResetConfirm.description: Serializer for confirming a password reset attempt.

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

email.description: Optional email address for contact or recovery
